data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
In compliance with Regulation 33 read with Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and
Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that
the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. November 07, 2024, interalia
approved the following:
1. Unaudited standalone and consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year
ended September 30, 2024.
2. Appointment of Mr. Abhay Kumar Pandey (DIN:
01650845) as an Additional, Non-Executive, Independent Director, for a first term of five
consecutive years, with effect from November 7, 2024 till November 6, 2029, not liable to
retire by rotation, subject to approval of the shareholders
3. Seeking approval of the Shareholders' for the appointment of Mr. Abhay Kumar Pandey by rotation by means of postal ballot through remote e-voting process only

data.caption: Audited Financial Resutles For Year Ended 31-03-2022
data.news_body:
In compliance with regulation 30 read with regulation 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
('Listing Regulations'), we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today i.e. May 20, 2022, transacted the tollowing items
of business:
1. Approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended March 31, 2022.
2, Recommended payment of final dividend of Rs. 3.00 (Rupees Three only) per equity share of the face value of Rs. 10 (Rupees Ten only) each for the financial
year ended 31st March, 2022, subject to approval of the shareholders at theensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM''').

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On May 20, 2022
data.news_body:
In compliance with regulation 30 read with regulation 33 of Securities and Exchange
Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
('Listing Regulations'), we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the
Company at the meeting held today i.e. May 20, 2022, transacted the tollowing items
of business:

1.Approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended March 31, 2022.

2.Recommended payment of final dividend of Rs. 3.00 (Rupees Three only) per
equity share of the face value of Rs. 10 (Rupees Ten only) each for the financial
year ended 31st March, 2022, subject to approval of the shareholders at the
ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM''').

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On February 11, 2022
data.news_body:
In compliance with regulation 30 read with regulation 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held on February 11, 2022 approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and nine month ended December 31, 2021 and took on record Limited Review report by the Statutory Auditor thereon.

In this regard, Please find enclosed the following:
a. Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Month ended December 31, 2021.
b. Limited Review report issued by the Statutory Auditor for the Quarter and Nine Month ended December 31, 2021.
c. The Press Release on the financial results for the Quarter and Nine Month ended December 31, 2021.
The Board meeting commenced at 13.30 hrs (IST) and concluded at 15.45 hrs (IST).
Please take the above information on record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On August 06, 2021
data.news_body:
In compliance with regulation 30 read with regulation 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held on August 06, 2021 inter-alia transacted following business:
I. Approved Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended June 30, 2021 and took
on record Limited Review report issued by the Statutory Auditor in this regard.
2. Approved convening of 21S Annual General Meeting of the Company on Thursday,
September 02, 2021, through video conferencing or other audio-visual means.
3. Recommended reappointment of Ms. Anita Hemant Jalan, the retiring executive
director of the Company.

In compliance with regulation 30 read with regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Reg. 2015, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held on May 14, 2021 inter-alia transacted following business:

The Board meeting commenced at 13.45 hrs (IST) and concluded at 15.30 hrs (IST). Please take the above information on record.
